methods.name: updateScrollTarget
methods.description: Updates the scroll target; Useful when the parent elements change so that the scrolling target also changes
methods.description_zh: 更新滚动目标;当父元素发生更改时很有用，因此滚动目标也会发生更改

events.name: refresh
events.description: Called whenever a refresh is triggered; at this time, your function should load more data
events.description_zh: 每当触发刷新时调用;此时，您的函数应该加载更多数据

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for background of the icon container from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

bg-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
bg-color.desc: Color name for background of the icon container from the Quasar Color Palette
bg-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

icon.description: Icon to display when refreshing the content
icon.description_zh: 刷新内容时显示的图标
icon.desc: Icon to display when refreshing the content

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content (area controlled by the component) goes here
slots.description_zh: 内容 （由组件控制的区域） 位于此处
